etymology.interpretation: 麗(麗) (lí, "beautiful") is a pictographic representation of a deer with antlers, symbolizing grace and beauty, reflective of the elegance often attributed to deer in various cultures.

examples.chinese: 这幅画展现了麗的风采(這幅畫展現了麗的風采)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè fú huà zhǎnxiànle lí de fēngcǎi.

examples.chinese: 她走进大厅(她走進大廳)，看见墙上挂着麗的字画(看見牆上掛著麗的字畫)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zǒu jìn dàtīng, kànjiàn qiáng shàng guàzhe lí de zìhuà.
examples.english: She walked into the hall, and saw elegant calligraphy hanging on the wall.

examples.chinese: 那座山因云雾缭绕而显得格外麗(那座山因雲霧繚繞而顯得格外麗)。
examples.pinyin: Nà zuò shān yīn yúnwù liáorào ér xiǎndé géwài lí.
examples.english: That mountain looks exceptionally elegant due to the swirling mist.
